entry.title: brendon-schu/media-gallery-backend: A lightweight Express.js backend for a media gallery, featuring image uploads, automatic thumbnail generation, categorization, and basic REST API functionality.

entry.title: tsevdos/elUtils: elUtils is a lightweight, zero-dependency TypeScript library providing utility functions for common tasks like geolocation, validation, and date handling, with features optimized for both Greek and international applications.
entry.content: elUtils is a lightweight, zero-dependency TypeScript library providing utility functions for common tasks like geolocation, validation, and date handling, with features optimized for both Greek and international applications.

entry.title: vicchimenti/funnelback-proxy: A lightweight proxy server system that manages search functionality between Seattle University's frontend applications and Funnelback's search services.
entry.content: A lightweight proxy server system that manages search functionality between Seattle University's frontend applications and Funnelback's search services.

entry.title: deephabiswashi/WebAI-UI: A privacy-focused, lightweight web UI for AI model interaction, supporting local & remote LLMs via OpenAI-compatible APIs. Features include conversation storage, file uploads, configurable model/API settings, real-time updates (WebSockets), auto-summarization, and customizable system prompts.
entry.content: A privacy-focused, lightweight web UI for AI model interaction, supporting local & remote LLMs via OpenAI-compatible APIs. Features include conversation storage, file uploads, configurable model/API settings, real-time updates (WebSockets), auto-summarization, and customizable system prompts.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...
entry.content: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...

entry.title: shaafsalman/FileNexus: A streamlined Node.js file management solution utilizing Multer for seamless document handling. This lightweight server application enables secure hosting, uploading, and distribution of PDFs and various file types through an intuitive link-sharing system.

entry.title: mannchaos/ConvertX: ConvertX is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension that allows users to instantly convert selected text (numbers) into different currencies via a popup. Powered by real-time exchange rates, ConvertX makes currency conversion effortless and seamless
entry.content: ConvertX is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension that allows users to instantly convert selected text (numbers) into different currencies via a popup. Powered by real-time exchange rates, ConvertX makes currency conversion effortless and seamless

entry.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
entry.content: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

entry.title: asruldev/minijwt: **minijwt** is a lightweight and fast JWT library designed to efficiently handle authentication without additional dependencies. Built with TypeScript for optimal security and scalability.
entry.content: **minijwt** is a lightweight and fast JWT library designed to efficiently handle authentication without additional dependencies. Built with TypeScript for optimal security and scalability.
